title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.6 - Plumbing-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.6 - Plumbing-general

State Regulations

Plumbing shall be sized, installed and maintained
according to 9 NYCRR Part
902
and
10
NYCRR Part 14. There shall be no
cross-connection between the potable water supply and any other system
containing: (a) water of unknown or
questionable origin; or
(b) contaminating or polluting substances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.6

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
